product_name: Native Eyewear Linville Reflex Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: With 2 sets of lenses, the Native Eyewear Linville Reflex Polarized Sunglasses are a great choice for year-round use, whether you're mountain biking, running, hiking or hanging at the beach. Interchangeable lens system lets you switch out lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. Polarized silver Reflex lenses are ideal for extremely bright sunlight; gray tint helps maintain color saturation and natural contrasts. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light to decrease eye fatigue, offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Second set of lenses are tinted for low-light conditions. Lenses and the lightweight yet durable frame are built to withstand a high-velocity impact; frame can endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Temple ends hug behind your ears to keep sunglasses in place; Cam-Action Hinges(TM) quickly lock temples into position. The Native Eyewear Linville Reflex Polarized Sunglasses fit large to extra-large profiles.
short_description: With 2 sets of lenses, the Native Eyewear Linville Reflex Polarized Sunglasses are a great choice for year-round use, whether you're mountain biking, running, hiking or hanging at the beach.
